snippet: Frank Sciame, the owner of a Connecticut estate once owned by Katharine Hepburn, fought local officials over whether two granite pillars at the end of a driveway should stand five or four feet tall.
abstract: Frank Sciame, owner of Connecticut estate once owned by Katharine Hepburn, fights local officials over height of two granite pillars at end of driveway.
lead_paragraph: Frank Sciame, the owner of a Connecticut estate once owned by Katharine Hepburn, fought local officials over whether two granite pillars at the end of a driveway should stand five or four feet tall.

headline.seo: Where Hepburn Lived, Last Act in Legal Drama on Size of 2 Posts
headline.main: Where Hepburn Lived, Last Act in Legal Drama Over Posts’ Height
headline.print_headline: Where Hepburn Lived, Last Act in Legal Drama Over Posts’ Height
